response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $12,000 by both of us. Considering its high quality and the benefits it offers, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $11,000. This special offer is designed to ensure you receive exceptional value while allowing me to maximize the return on my investment. I believe this price reflects the product's true worth and provides a favorable deal for both parties. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 11000}
